REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1858 reute d f BC-TRADESTAR-<TIRR>-ACQU 03-31 0050

TEXT.TITLE: TRADESTAR <TIRR> ACQUIRES IMAGE VIDEO
TEXT.BODY: Tradestar Corp said it acquired <Image Video Inc> for an undisclosed sum. The company said Image Video produces and distributes videos for the home market. Image Video is scheduled to release 20 video projects in 1987, it said. Reuter
